profile.name: Daniel
profile.title: Software Backend Engineer üöÄ
profile.description:
I'm a software engineer with over 5 years of experience crafting software. I was working in startups and software consultancies developing mostly e-commerces and marketplaces.
I'm looking for opportunities where I can develop my skills trying to follow good practices.

I like discussing problem solutions, understanding what businesses need and how I can help them.

Also, I like to attend software conferences and events to stay up-to-date and meet other professionals.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJkY5hXt0UWQ0RqImEFfET30k)

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
I would like a job with interesting technological problems to be solved.
Mentoring is a must. I love mentoring people, it's the easiest way to be a better professional.
Having workmates who inspire you is important.

Good practices are a must too. During my last year working in tech, I was using TDD approach (so many times as I could), doing code reviews and discussing possible solutions with the rest of the team.

Regarding remote jobs, I prefer remote positions but having a co-working place or offices where I can go to work is a nice thing.
